Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the assertion that the photo was taken during the specified time and location.

Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the image was created by Brent Shavnore as digital storm art and was not a real-time photograph of Myrtle Beach during the hurricane.
Understate: There is no evidence of any understatement bias in the provided claim.
Falters at times: There is no indication of the claim faltering at times in the provided information.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide any alternative explanations for the image or its origin.
